website_summaries.verdict: The best molds for creating a range of detailed gummies.
pros: Thick and durable trays make a variety of highly detailed animal gummies
Set of 2 trays comes with a dropper
Fully-set gummies pop out of tray with ease
Trays are designed to handle a wide range of temperatures
cons: Gummies are a bit on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gummies!
customer_reviews.text: Made collagen gummies with the Vital Proteins grass fed beef gelatin and tart cherry juice. Amazing! Recipe from Mama Natural's Week by Week Guide to Pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 year old granddaughter to make gummy bears. I found a recipe for us to try and these molds worked perfectly! The recipe I used was gelatin based and these molds were just the right size for the recipe. My granddaughter had no problems using the included dropper to fill the molds. Removing the gummies from the molds was easy to do once they had set sufficiently. We initially didn't wait for them to fully set and the first one we tried came out in pieces. We let them set a little longer and they popped out no problem. Clean up was easy. All it took was some warm water and a little dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: john264

customer_reviews.title: Five out of five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mold for my sister to play with making hard candies and gummy bears. Works great for both! I love the thickness of silicone mold and pretty sure that the product will last very long! Unlike other packages this package comes with dropper which we absolutely love! The dropper allows us to make multi colored bears! The item arrived one day earlier that expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy Zh

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and finally got around to using it. Overall I really love it. The shapes are super cute. The gummies popped right out with no issues so there wasn't much to clean up, just rinsed with soap and warm water. My only complaint is once filled you can't just lift it up and move it as it is a bit flimsy. I just put it on a cookie sheet though and everything was fine. And need I say again SUPER CUTE shapes :)
customer_reviews.author: Amariepeace

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, non-returnable
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and do not appear suitable for younger kids or anyone without steady hands. Also, note that this item is NOT RETURNABLE - the above statement with 100% manufacturer warranty is false. I tried to return and was told that this was a nonreturnable food item. Thankfully Amazon stepped in and fixed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: The Friley's

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! The day it arrived my kids juiced fruits and veggies so I could make their fruit snacks. They turned out so adorable and well detailed! Will definitely be adding more to my cupboard soon!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: I used these to make Candle molds and they came out perfect!
customer_reviews.text: As a distributor of Country Scents Candles, I used these to make Candle molds and they came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Murray

customer_reviews.title: Extremely detailed gummies!
customer_reviews.text: These molds are extremely easy to use and create very detailed animals! Every animal has a clear face and distinctive features. You can even see clear paw prints on the gummy bears! Pros: Great detail Easy to pop out the gummies when solid Silicon allows them to chill quickly Clean well in dishwasher Very effective dropper Cons: You need to peel from the edges to pop them out Must be on a tray or something solid to move when full Easy to underfill
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Comes off nicely and easily
customer_reviews.text: The gummies I made all came off perfectly and easily. Even the worms which my daughter all ate before I got to take a picture. The dropper was a little difficult because itll just spill out on its own, but you can learn to control it. The rubber bulb is also removable so its easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Verna

customer_reviews.title: So I got these for my son
customer_reviews.text: Who now has very restricted eating plan. These molds are a fun way for the both of us to make homemade fruit snacks and treats! Extremely easy to use and small enough to fit in a fridge without taking up to much room. Clean up is quick and easy. We use these once a week and so far they have kept up with us. Would recommend to anyone who is looking for something along these lines!! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: BerkeleyM

customer_reviews.title: Dashing and daring, courageous and caring....
customer_reviews.text: These silicone molds were exactly as described. I really liked them and have used them a couple of times already to make little gummies. The food dropper was easy to use and overall I felt like this was a great deal! I've had the theme song from Disneys Gummie Bears stuck in my head for 2 days!! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: WORKED PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: Used the molds today. My 6 year old grandson and I made two batches with these molds today. It was easy to do, they came out fine, no trouble. He enjoyed himself. The only negative is I think there should be two droppers, one for each mold. It would go much faster and we could have both done it at the same time. A dropper for each mold should be a rule of thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hunt

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to do jellies
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I went out and got this item. It was great to make gummies and jello shots with the bros, this is such a good investment for that creative person out there.
customer_reviews.author: EasternBoi

customer_reviews.text: I like everything about those gummy molds! The variety of animals - every picky kid will find his favorite shape - worms are very cool addition too! :) Gummies are very easy to remove and they're in the perfect shape. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I made little chocolates for my daughters gender reveal party and these were easy to remove when ready and easy to clean. You even get a bonus,a dropper for making gummy bears. The bears are really cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn McGovern

customer_reviews.title: Gummy worms and ice worms.
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are great if you have a kid that likes making stuff. I got bears and worms coming out of my ears now. Great product. The dropper is cool, wish it came with two though so I could get in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mold
customer_reviews.text: So simple my 4 yr old can do it 👍. We made gummy snacks with jello and UF gelatine and the kids just popped them right out after an hour in the fridge. Easy peasy and the molds came out so cute. Recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey V.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Already ordered more!
customer_reviews.text: I just made a trial run of gummies with a bit of juice and gelatin, and it came out fantastic. I lightly oiled the molds with a bit of avocado oil, and the gummies are popping out beautifully. This was not the case with molds I've used in the past. I just ordered another set and also the little monsters by the same company. I wish there were more designs!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Boys

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make sugar free gummies for myself. They are the small gummies like original size bought at the store. I was amazed how easy cleanup was and how easily gummies came out of molds. I did grease the molds before using the dropper to add gelatin mixture. Love it when you can purchase something and it's exactly what you ordered but even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love making gummies!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! My son and I used these to make gummy bears,... Easy to pop the gummies out of the mold, but difficult to dry the mold after washing it. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NCMom1317

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these several times now and absolutely love them! 1/2 cup water, 1 small pack of any jello, 1 package of clear gelatine, heat until dissolved pour into molds with the amazing eye dropper, refrigerate for about 30 min... Note I put a tiny bit more water in mine so it will fill all of the gummy molds.. Works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a blast with the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the product yet but I can't wait to play with my grandkids with them. I love the variety of shapes and the ribs in the worms. I can tell they are nice silicone molds that should be easy to work with. It's also nice that they included an eye dropper so that you don't have to buy it separately (even though I did so everybody could have one). I just bought disposable ones from the science area.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pope

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Well it looked good in the pictures but when you get the molds the figures are so tiny. Hard to remove the jello from the molds without breaking. The details on the molds are barely visible since the molds are so small.
customer_reviews.author: NYC tennis

customer_reviews.title: These work great as they are intended
customer_reviews.text: These work great as they are intended. I was a little surprised at how small they were but I should've known by the description. The bears are smaller than a gummy bear.
customer_reviews.author: kayjua

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: I made gummies using these molds and they turned out great! The molds are easy to use and clean. I did not even have to use cooking spray. I used the dropper that came with the molds and after filling and freezing for 20 mins they popped right out! Make sure to keep your full dropper upright and do not turn upside down. If the dropper is turned upside down and the liquid runs into the dropper part when you turn it back upright the fluid will shoot out the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved the finished product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once with chocolate. The syringe did not work for what I used it for but may work with other liquids. The molds were smaller than I expected but you can still tell what the animals are. My grandkids loved the chocolate animals. The form was sturdy and easy to clean. I will be looking for more that are a little larger. I put my car keys next to them so you can see the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived timely and intact
customer_reviews.text: These mounds are soooo cute! I like the smallness of the shapes but filling the small mounds with a dropper is tedious. We make gummy bears and dog cookies out of them. Really great follow up customer service making sure all is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Lauer, CMT

customer_reviews.title: Adorable molds that are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the molds! The pipette isn't great, but the molds are wonderful. Easy to use and easy to clean. We ended up using a 1/2 teaspoon to fill the little animal molds and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: JDHero

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small, too tedious. Make sure you spray liberally with oil, and keep warm while filling up all those tiny holes. My gelatin gelled on me and I had to remelt.
customer_reviews.author: Suwanneelady9

customer_reviews.title: Cute gummy candies
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter and I made homemade gummy bears, penguins, monkeys, and worms. The molds worked perfectly. They were so cute. I want to make chocolate and mint candies next time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Veldman

customer_reviews.title: adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt even realize when I bought that it had animals other than bears! So super cute. Easy to use and clean. just make sure you wait to move it or put the molds on a cookie tray
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: Versitile Mold
customer_reviews.text: I made sugar free gummies. I sprayed it with coconut oil before I put the gelatin in and they came out like a charm. They are VERY flexible, though, so I had to put it on a hard surface to put it in the fridge. Temperature range is -40 to over 400 deg F. Very versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for any molding. Gummies, chocolates, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely super sturdy and flexible enough to turn inside out to remove gummy’s. First ones turned out successful. Thanks for the great molds. Will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: These molds worked great! The are really easy to use. The gummies easily popped out of the molds and they are easy to clean up. Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julauch

customer_reviews.title: SOOO cute!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make my first ever gummy bears, lions, monkey's, penguins and worms. I was pleasantly surprised how easy they were to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Van Goor

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I made 6 batches, almost 250 gummies. They are very easy to use and I had fun making them. They were for a baby shower for my daughter who was having a boy so all blue gummies. You can find recipes on line and very easy to mix up. Have fun with these.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyKM

customer_reviews.title: they are smaller then what they appeared to be.
customer_reviews.text: They are OK.. I thought they were larger than they were. But they will do. I haven't used them yet but they look like my other molds and will be easy to use. But I will think twice about ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, tests great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for my infused hydration products!!! I use for my own chronic issues. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: gifts wanted

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Trying to remove the jello is impossible, too small details and the feet and hands don't come out properly
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set!
customer_reviews.text: My girls LOVE these! This is the third set we have purchased for birthday gifts. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jana D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gummy mold
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I LOVED the mold. I made my gummies using 1 pack of sugar free flavored jello, 4 gelatin packs, and 1/2 cup of water and heated everything on the stove. All the animal details came through and were adorable. They were the perfect size too. The gummies popped right out with no effort. You made a great product!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: This a good one!
customer_reviews.text: These are great molds. The animals shapes are adorable, and each is easy to fill, remove the candy, and clean. The dropper works well and is large enough to fit a cleaning tool inside the tube. All around good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: they work great..
customer_reviews.text: using these for coconut oil for my dogs..they work great...just besure to fill them completely full otherwise they just break into bits when you. remove the oil...
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Trebino

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received this on Friday my grandsons were so happy on Saturday and Sunday we made 2 different flavors.they are so easy to pop out and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: The molds are great but the dropper should come with a tool that makes it easier to clean
customer_reviews.author: Morgan E

customer_reviews.title: Great buy ...good size...real silicon
customer_reviews.text: I started my gummy business using these they are real silicon I can pop them out pretty clean...I still use cornstarch first but the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Be Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 product works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool. Found out I really suck at making gummy bears and can't get them to taste good, but that has nothing to do with this product! LOL
customer_reviews.author: C. D. A

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for making jello bites. The squeeze dropper made it very easy to put the jello liquid in the animal shapes. My only issue was it was too wobbly to move from the counter to the fridge, but a cookie sheet solved that problem and fit them both.
customer_reviews.author: mkmar

customer_reviews.title: Love all the different shapes and the fact that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love all the different shapes and the fact that it came with its' own eyedropper as well. The gummies do not stick at all to the molds and the detailing of the actual shapes are incredible. Will definitely be buying more of these and in different shapes too!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a boredom buster as we finish our self-quarantine. My daughter was too excited to use this that she didn’t even spray oil on them yet the gummies came out fine. We both loved the details and she even mentioned that we should sell the healthy gummies she made.
customer_reviews.author: Seachic0515

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic results
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was expecting poor results and tedious labor. Not so! The dropper works remarkably well, no leaks whatsoever. Removal of the gummies was very easy, no breakage, no bits left behind. Super easy to clean. Will probably purchase additional molds.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummy bear molds, I was worried that the details would end up distorted like the faces/legs etc. They surprised me however, they do not stick at all. They are very pliable so very easy to pop the gummy out of the mold. I bout an additional set after my first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieMae

customer_reviews.title: Kids friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great overall use for candy. Son love making gummies bears with these. Great for kids to use in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: My baby girl likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to use this, and had fun making gummy candies.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Skinner

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved them
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to not like. A tiny, soft but secure brush to clean them with would be nice. Chocolate can be greasy, and the molds are so tiny they are hard to clean. (That would be another item for you to sell. Either with the molds or on their on, l believe customers would buy yhem.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great molds.
customer_reviews.text: Fun shapes, variety and a good price. I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved to make healthy gummies with me
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved to make healthy gummies with me. The dropper is putting bubbles in so we used measure tsb instead.
customer_reviews.author: jiahesson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute molds!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with amazing details. Seller was very helpful after Amazon sent the wrong item. I would recommend these and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great mold for gummy worms and bears.
customer_reviews.text: "These are amazing. The gummies have so much detail and come out easily."
customer_reviews.author: Sommer wall.

customer_reviews.title: Their cool and they work well
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and theyre cool to make assorted gummies. . . the good kind
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: We made home made gummys so much fun !! Molds are so cute and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: I have not used them as yet, but they look very good, well made and durable. I will follow up as soon as I make some
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of animals
customer_reviews.text: Great size for gummies! Kids loved the worms especially. A nice variety of animals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Homemade Gummies
customer_reviews.text: Love making my own Gummies for my Grand Children! They are much more healthy than the ones you buy! My grandchildren have fun with having the different shapes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gummy Trays
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety and so does my daughter! These really do great in the fridge or refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Katelin Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these molds! It gives the gummies such good detail and look like store bought and not homemade. They pop out so easily and just easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had tons of fun making gummy bears. Just Google a recipe and it's easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: mezzomama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed them for. Will be looking for a few bigger molds also.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Plainer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome molds!
customer_reviews.text: Great mold,great quality and they look like their going to last me awhile, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: My oldest daughter and I love making gummy animals with these molds! Great way to spend time with my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little critters. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I have made BATCHES of gummy bears with these. We love them. I had minimal candies stick which was nice. We will 100% be using these over and over again as well as we will be buying more. We love theses. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl

customer_reviews.title: The animals in these silicone forms are absolutely adorable! They have quite a bit of detail that ...
customer_reviews.text: The animals in these silicone forms are absolutely adorable! They have quite a bit of detail that actually transferred very well to our homemade gummies and they released the gummies easil. I want to try making chocolates with them next!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Only used part of it once, then threw it away. Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: The molds were so cute and it was easy to use. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make healthy gummies for my grandchildren. They love the assortment of shapes. Very easy to use. The gummies popped out easily without having to spray the mold. The dropper made it very easy to fill. Easy to clean with a kitchen scrubber brush.
customer_reviews.author: sggrx

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. The different animals are slightly different volumes but very detailed and pretty easy to pop out
customer_reviews.author: Mike m.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - Love the different styles of animals
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use and the gummies pop out nicely. We liked this set because it had so many different shapes of animals.
customer_reviews.author: D2odlebug

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast & the molds are adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast & the molds are adorable! Easy to use, the gummys I made popped right out nice & clean!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: I used these molds to make some red wine gummies and they turned out perfectly! The molds were super easy to use and the gummies popped out really easily 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make and super easy to remove from molds!! 100% perfect product
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean made a batch already
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean made a batch already. Need to fine tune the recipe etc but overall not a bad purchase if you looking for molds for candy making.
customer_reviews.author: RaOmari

customer_reviews.title: Making gummies, making memories!!
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic. My kids have been wanting to make homemade gummy bears this was perfect, virtually no sticking easy to pop out! Making gummies can be a little messy and sticky but we lined the counter with old news papers! Definitely will buy again if they go on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia C. Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you spray it with non stick. Its adorable I love the molds.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea25

customer_reviews.title: Cutie Patutie
customer_reviews.text: These molds are so very cute and do the job they were designed to do. Love the different shapes and the dropper works well too.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wellington

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. High temp silicon, we were able to wash on the to rack of our dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ratchet of Knoxville

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fun for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: I used these molds for the first time today and so far so good. They are great quality and they make very cute bears, lions, monkeys, and worms. My daughter had a blast making them and she is ready to make more tonight. I found a great recipe that uses jello, plain gelatin, and water. So easy! Thanks for making these fun molds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Quality, and Ease of Use!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Our first batch of gummies turned out beautifully! They popped out of the mold easily and all the details on the little animal faces were adorable. The size is perfect. Also, the dropper was really helpful in filling the mold. I would highly recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: No problems here.
customer_reviews.text: Good silicone molds. I should have ordered more. One batch of the gummies mixture required a full sheet and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They're too small very difficult to get out I would go with the all gummy Worms there at least a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These work great! The gummies popped right out with no problem. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these silicone trays to make gummy bears, gummy worms and gummy people as my son calls them, lol. We had a lot of fun making the gelitan and then adding different flavors for unique tastes. If you want to make gummy candy and enjoy the easy release molds than these are definitely what one needs.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J

customer_reviews.title: Make the perfect size gummies
customer_reviews.text: These molds are so cute and work great for making your own gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Busy momma

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shapes! ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Great shapes. The molds have such great detail and are articulated so well! The dropper makes this nearly mess free. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: woop woop

customer_reviews.title: Scammed by return policy
customer_reviews.text: I received a downy ball?! I'm unable to return the item even though I ordered candy molds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I’ve only used it once but that time worked out great for what I needed. It was easy to clean and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with these and they’re so cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! They work like a charm for a great price. Perfect for making gummies. They pop right out without oiling prior.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: They do look like we’ll have fun using them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas so I haven’t actually used them yet. They do look like we’ll have fun using them. Can’t wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON R.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: works great, a little hard to clean and remove, but is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: They popped right out of the molds and the details came out great! So cute
customer_reviews.text: I just made homemade coconut oil chocolates. They turned out perfectly! They popped right out of the molds and the details came out great! So cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: My gummies turned out SO CUTE!! Just remember to spray your molds!!

product_meta.title: Gummy Bear Mold Bpa Free Silicone (Yellow, Blue) - Set of 2 for 86 Candies - 5 Different Types of Animals - Dropper Included - Candy Molds, Gummy Worm Mold, Chocolate Molds, Gelatin Molds, Ice Cube
product_meta.description:
HAVE YOU NOTICED THAT THE CHILDREN GET MORE INTERESTED IN THE SNACKS THAT LOOK AMUSING? 

Using our mini non-stick silicone candy molds maker, you can easily create healthy and beautiful snacks, which will surprise you and your kids, as well as your friends!

This treat is capable of CHEERING YOU UP, CREATING A FESTIVE ATMOSPHERE. You only need a little patience and imagination to create a fairy tale with your own hands.

Here are some features of the silicone chocolate mold trays:
- Versatility - it contains 5 kinds of animals – a bear, a lion, a monkey, a penguin and a worm shapes.
- DIY candy, different gummy dinosaurs bears, gelatin worms, fruit snack candy shaped like monkeys, lions, as well as cake decor and different chocolate treats.
- Safe, non-toxic material.
- The gummy worms gumdrop mold does not absorb odors.
- Has a wide temperature range from - 40 to 450°F.
- Easy to clean in the sink or dishwasher. 
- The products are easy to take out by flipping the jelly mold silicone inside out.
- The mold does not get deformed, is comfortable to keep folded. 

PRODUCT DETAILS:
A Set of 2
heat - resistant silicone
colors: yellow, blue
size: 8х12 inches
a mix of 5 different kinds of animals: a bear, a lion, a monkey, a penguin and a worm
for 88 candies
the products do not stick
A GREAT BONUS GIFT – ONE DROPPER.

RISK FREE: If you're not satisfied with The Silly Pops sour candy molds baby, we guarantee that you will get your money back.

Homemade candy is not a problem!

WITH OUR SILICONE MOLD "The Silly Pops" YOU WILL BE ABLE TO CREATE REAL WORKS OF ART. Such a variety of sweets made at home will impress your guests and really please the children who have a sweet tooth. 

So, what are you waiting for? Order now!

CLICK THE "ADD TO CART BUTTON" button above and Get Your New hard candy molds!
feature_bullets: GET THE BEST VALUE FOR MONEY - purchasing silicone gummy molds you get a gift – a dropper to help you started making of 5 types of animals treats: 10 gummy bears, lions, monkeys; 9 penguins; 4 worms
100% HARMLESS MATERIAL - the gummy bear molds are made of the food-grade BPA free silicone, have been confirmed by certification and can withstand temperatures from 40 to 450°F.
FEEL FREE TO CREATE - with gummie bear molds it is easy to imagine and make new recipes and DIY candy real; You can freeze juice or cook small portions of gelatin, chocolate or fruit snack candy.

MULTIPURPOSE - can be used with any mixtures - gelatin, fruit mass, chocolate so on; Our silicone candy molds for gelatin are not only have a good detalization, but also the figures slip out very easily

100% WARRANTY - we are so confident that you'll absolutely love The Silly Pops silicone gummy bears molds that if you are not fully satisfied with our product, we will refund all your money within 30 days
